languages.text: "Тогда вы прибыли напрасно. Эурак-V — наблюдательная станция. Мы не скрепляем контракты и не предоставляем навигаторов. Вынужден сказать вам прямо..." {n}, — старик морщится от боли, но вы не видите ран на его теле, —{/n} "...время для переговоров вы выбрали весьма неподходящее".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда вы прибыли напрасно. Эурак-V — наблюдательная станция. Мы не скрепляем контракты и не предоставляем Навигаторов. Вынужден сказать вам прямо..." {n}, — старик морщится от боли, но вы не видите ран на его теле, —{/n} "...время для переговоров вы выбрали весьма неподходящее".

languages.text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."
languages.original_text: "Тогда вы прибыли напрасно. Эурак-V — наблюдательная станция. Мы не скрепляем контракты и не предоставляем навигаторов. Вынужден сказать вам прямо..." {n}, — старик морщится от боли, но вы не видите ран на его теле, —{/n} "...время для переговоров вы выбрали весьма неподходящее".

traits.locale_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

"Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

"Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

"Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

languages.text: “那你恐怕要白跑一趟了。欧拉克五号星站是一座观察星站，我们从不签订合约，也不提供导航者。我必须得明确地告诉你——”{n}老人的脸痛苦地抽动着，但你并没有看到他的身上有任何伤口。{/n}“——你真是挑了个最不方便的时间进行招聘谈判。”
languages.original_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

traits.locale_text: “那你恐怕要白跑一趟了。欧拉克五号星是一座观察星站，我们从不签订合约，也不提供导航者。我必须得明确地告诉你——”{n}老人的脸痛苦地抽动着，但你并没有看到他的身上有任何伤口。{/n}“——你真是挑了个最不方便的时间进行招聘谈判。”

languages.text: «Entonces ha venido para nada. Eurac V es una estación de observación. No hacemos contratos ni proporcionamos Navegantes. Debo ser franco con usted...». {n}El anciano hace una mueca de dolor, aunque no ves ninguna herida en su cuerpo.{/n} «... No ha elegido un buen momento para negociar un reclutamiento».
languages.original_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces ha venido para nada. Eurac V es una estación de observación. No hacemos contratos ni proporcionamos Navegantes. Debo ser franco con usted...». {n}El anciano hace una mueca de dolor, aunque no ves ninguna herida en su cuerpo.{/n} «... No ha elegido un buen momento para negociar un reclutamiento».

languages.text: 「ならば、あなたはここに来たのは無駄だったということになるな。ユーラック・Vは観測ステーションだ。契約は結ばないし、航宙士を供給することもない。はっきり言っておくが…」{n}老人は痛みにうずくまるが、体に傷はない。{/n}「あなたは採用交渉に最も不都合な時期を選んだのだ」
languages.original_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、あなたはここに来たのは無駄だったということになるな。ユーラック・Vは観測ステーションだ。契約は結ばないし、航宙士を供給することもない。はっきり言っておくが…」{n}老人は痛みにうずくまるが、体に傷はない。{/n}「あなたは採用交渉に最も不都合な時期を選んだのだ」

languages.text: "Dann seid Ihr umsonst gekommen. Eurac V ist eine Beobachtungsstation. Wir unterzeichnen keine Verträge und wir stellen keine Navigatoren zur Verfügung. Ich muss Euch sagen"{n}, der alte Mann verzieht vor Schmerzen das Gesicht, doch du siehst keine Wundern an seinem Körper,{/n} "Ihr habt einen äußerst ungünstigen Zeitpunkt für Personalverhandlungen gewählt."
languages.original_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

traits.locale_text: "Dann seid Ihr umsonst gekommen. Eurac V ist eine Beobachtungsstation. Wir unterzeichnen keine Verträge und wir stellen keine Navigatoren zur Verfügung. Ich muss Euch sagen"{n}, der alte Mann verzieht vor Schmerzen das Gesicht, doch du siehst keine Wundern an seinem Körper,{/n} "Ihr habt einen äußerst ungünstigen Zeitpunkt für Personalverhandlungen gewählt."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je crains que vous soyez {mf|venu|venue} jusqu'ici pour rien. Eurac-V est une station d'observation. Nous ne signons pas de contrats et nous ne fournissons pas de navigateurs. En toute franchise... » {n}Le vieil homme grimace de douleur, mais il ne semble pas blessé pour autant.{/n} « ... vous avez choisi un moment peu propice au recrutement. »
languages.original_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je crains que vous soyez {mf|venu|venue} jusqu'ici pour rien. Eurac-V est une station d'observation. Nous ne signons pas de contrats et nous ne fournissons pas de navigateurs. En toute franchise... » {n}Le vieil homme grimace de douleur, mais il ne semble pas blessé pour autant.{/n} « ... vous avez choisi un moment peu propice au recrutement. »

languages.text: "O hâlde buraya bir hiç uğruna gelmişsin. Eurac V, gözlem istasyonudur. Kontrat imzalamaz, Rotacı temin etmeyiz. Sana karşı açık olayım." {n}İhtiyar adam acıyla irkiliyor ancak bedeninde herhangi bir yara göremiyorsun.{/n} "Rotacı temini görüşmeleri için son derece uygunsuz bir zaman seçmişsin."
languages.original_text: "Then you have come here for nothing. Eurac V is an observation station. We do not make contracts and we do not supply Navigators. I must tell you plainly—" {n}The old man winces in pain, but you do not see any wounds on his body.{/n} "—you have chosen a most inconvenient time for recruitment negotiations."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde buraya bir hiç uğruna gelmişsin. Eurac V, gözlem istasyonudur. Kontrat imzalamaz, Rotacı temin etmeyiz. Sana karşı açık olayım." {n}İhtiyar adam acıyla irkiliyor ancak bedeninde herhangi bir yara göremiyorsun.{/n} "Rotacı temini görüşmeleri için son derece uygunsuz bir zaman seçmişsin."
